title: Chicken with apples
ingredients: ['For the apples', '2 medium shallots, finely chopped', '2 dessert apples, peeled and cut into 5mm (¼in) slices', '225ml (8fl oz) apple juice', '175ml (6fl oz) low-sodium chicken stock', '1 tbsp Calvados or apple juice', 'For the chicken', '35g (1¼oz) plain flour', 'pepper to taste', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 140g (5oz) each', '2 tbsp whipping cream']
